logentry.author: roku
logentry.msg: Set log4j log level for jcs to ERROR as voted today. This spuresses some confusing console WARN loggings of jcs, if log4j is disabled during build. In this case lenya uses a concole appender for logging.

logentry.author: roku
logentry.msg: Deleting CVS dirs from build/lenya/webapp/lenya/pubs and subdirs since copyPubs task is not using the defaultexcludes attribute. This should improve the build process, since one tends to forget to delete the cvs dirs by hand. See #29196

logentry.author: roku
logentry.msg: Added unpacking of WAR file if needed (on first start up of lenya). See #29026.

logentry.msg: why bother with css and the lenya GUI guidelines when you can have font tags and debug output...

logentry.author: roku
logentry.msg: - Started translation of Image upload/insert screen(bxe) - fixed i18n stuff in Asset upload/insert screen(bxe) - started using logical message keys instead of the texts itself as key

logentry.author: roku
logentry.msg: Bugfix for bug #29117. Added method filterURI in order to remove session info encoded within the uri, otherwise the URIParametrizer would fail on such an unfiltered uri.

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg:
improve RC error messages (no longer omit cause of exception) remove obsolete exception.xsp
the RC code uses exceptions for flow control.. hopefully we can soon rip it out and replace it with repository code.

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: improve error message when checkout fails. for some reason we didnt show the exception message.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: showing + disabling SSL checkbox when parent URL is SSL-protected

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Made getDocument() public. This is a hack due to the insufficient workflow condition interface (should be reconsidered when the new API is designed).

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: asserting that workflow name is not null and non-empty

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: replaced assertion with exception for non-valid areas

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: setting Cache-Control header for sitetree javascript (enforce reloading)

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg:
change the navigation framework to create absolute links including the host and protocol if SSL is enabled anywhere in a publication. this is necessary to make navigating between SSL and non SSL pages of a site possible (without a protocol it is not possible to distinguish otherwise)
if you have problems with your links through a proxy, consider using the live mount prefix. this will rewrite links in your live area to the form /livemountprefix/documentid/. use / as livemountprefix for virtual hosts (it willl rewrite lenya/yourpub/authoring/index.html yousite.com/index.html and so on)
yeah i know this needs more documentation :)

logentry.msg: xpath as element instead as attribute

logentry.author: egli

* The encoding is now taken from the request and no longer from the sitemap parameter.
* Said encoding is used when writing the file. This seems to solve a few problems with umlauts.

enforce password security when changing passwords.
* at least 6 characters long * at least one digit

logentry.author: gregor
logentry.msg: strangely, <script/> was turned into <script> in xhtml which broke the rendering. changed to <script> </script>. still a lot of changes needed before we can finally switch to xhtml in the authoring area. for instance, the whole <td background= business is broken in xhtml.

logentry.msg: Added def. of init-param form-encoding. I set it to utf-8. Otherwise I had many problems using forms with special chars in. Trapo had that problem , too. So, if this chnage causes any problems, we need to revert this fix.

Changes:

logentry.author: roku
logentry.msg:
This checkin should fix bug 27474.
Changes:
- exclude all xalan jars from cocoon webapp space during copy process in build scripts - updated shipped xalan to version 2.6.0 - updated nekopull to version 0.2.4 which fixes an xerces-2.6.2 issue with the class ObjectFactory which has been removed from xerces due to security issues - moved nekopull libs from docs-new pub to global WEB-INF/lib

logentry.author: egli
